price: Her kim, mümin olarak iyi olan işlerden yaparsa, artık o, ne zulümden ne de hakkının çiğnenmesinden korkar.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَلَا يَخَافُ ظُلۡمٗا وَلَا هَضۡمٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mina al-ṣāliḥāti wahuwa mu'minun falā yakhāfu ẓul'man walā haḍman
